tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE concerts (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    artist_band_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_band_id) REFERENCES artists(artist_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE ConcertPerformances (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT,
    band_id INT,
    concert_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES Artists(artist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (band_id) REFERENCES Bands(band_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (concert_id) REFERENCES Concerts(concert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE artists (
  artist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(100),
  debut_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE bands (
  band_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  band_name VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(100),
  formed_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE concerts (
  concert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  concert_name VARCHAR(255),
  venue VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE band_members (
  member_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  band_id UUID,
  member_name VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE artist_in_concert (
  artist_id UUID,
  concert_id UUID,
  performance_time TIME
)
